metadata.title: CVE-2019-7327 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3,allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable'scale' parameter value in the view frame (frame.php) because properfiltration is omitted.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
